mods.abstract: WAS COMMITTED TO JAIL A MULATTO woman who says she belongs to James Field, she goes by the name of MARY, 35 years old, and speaks English only, Her owner is requested to comply with the law and take her out of jail MARCELIN AGUILLARD, Jailor. P't Coupee, jy-3 1858.

detail.title: Pointe Coupee Democrat. : (False River [i.e. New Roads], Parish of Pointe Coupee [La.]) 1858-1862
